te_416.utterance: Well , yes , we are , madam . The shop shuts down in five minutes .

te_416.utterance: I shall not keep you long then . It was about some saucepans you had in your window last week .

te_416.speaker: A
te_416.utterance: Last week , madam ? I really can't remember which ones you mean . What were they like ?

te_416.speaker: B
te_416.utterance: Oh , they were lovely . Sort of imitation wood , dark brown color , country-style you know , and the lids , if I remember rightly , they had a sort of leaf pattern , or was it flowers ?

expanded emotion cause span: they were lovely . Sort of imitation wood , dark brown color , country-style you know , and the lids , if I remember rightly , they had a sort of leaf pattern , or was it flowers ?

te_416.speaker: A
te_416.utterance: That's strange . I don't recognize any of the ones we had from that description . Are you sure they were in this shop ?

te_416.speaker: B
te_416.utterance: Oh , you must know the ones I mean . They were on sale , a real bargain . Reduced to a quarter of the original price . I couldn't believe my eyes when I saw them .

te_416.speaker: A
te_416.utterance: I am afraid the sales are over now , madam . And you know we all sold out of the saucepans .
expanded emotion cause span: I am afraid the sales are over now , madam . And you know we all sold out of the saucepans .

te_416.speaker: B
te_416.utterance: I don't think you did , you know . My neighbor told me she saw some here only yesterday .

te_416.speaker: A
te_416.utterance: Well , it's all new stock in the window now .

te_416.speaker: B
te_416.utterance: May I just have a look , to see if there is anything else ?

te_416.speaker: A
te_416.utterance: Eh , well , madam , as you know we are closing .

te_416.speaker: B
te_416.utterance: Yes , yes , I am sorry I won't keep you . It must get on your nerves when customers come in right at closing time . But they were such beautiful saucepans . I ' d have bought them if I had made up my mind on the spot .

te_416.speaker: A
te_416.utterance: Perhaps madam , if you come back tomorrow , I could show you the whole range of kitchen ware . And there are still one or two things at the sale price .

te_416.speaker: B
te_416.utterance: Oh , look ! That was the one there . That is the sort of thing I was looking for . But it's not quite the color .
te_416.explanation: the sight of the desired saucepan triggered happiness

te_416.speaker: A

tr_8938.speaker: A
tr_8938.utterance: You won't believe what just happened .

tr_8938.utterance: I went down to change some money , right ?

tr_8938.speaker: B
tr_8938.utterance: Yes . We need some . How much did you change ?

tr_8938.speaker: A
tr_8938.utterance: I wanted to change around 5000 dollars . And you know the exchange rate .

tr_8938.speaker: B
tr_8938.utterance: Yes , it's about 35 pesos for every Taiwan dollar , right ?

tr_8938.speaker: B
expanded emotion cause span: it's about 35 pesos for every Taiwan dollar ,
Not today .

tr_8938.speaker: A
tr_8938.utterance: I went into the bank with my money , and I looked at the exchange board . At first I couldn't believe it . I thought I was reading the board wrong or something .

tr_8938.speaker: B
expanded emotion cause span: At first I couldn't believe it . I thought I was reading the board wrong or something .

tr_8938.speaker: A
tr_8938.utterance: Because the board said 60 pesos for every Taiwan dollar .
expanded emotion cause span: it's about 35 pesos for every Taiwan dollar ,
60 pesos for every Taiwan dollar .

tr_8938.speaker: B
tr_8938.utterance: Sixty ? That's too much . How can that be ?

tr_8938.speaker: A
tr_8938.utterance: I thought it was wrong too . It didn't make sense .

tr_8938.speaker: B
tr_8938.utterance: Just two days ago it was 35 . How can it be 60 ?
expanded emotion cause span: Just two days ago it was 35 . How can it be 60 ?

tr_8938.speaker: A
tr_8938.utterance: So , I went up to the teller and started to exchange the money . And it's true . They really gave me sixty pesos for the dollar .

tr_8938.speaker: B
tr_8938.utterance: That's amazing ! Really ? How could it change so much in two days ?
expanded emotion cause span: They really gave me sixty pesos for the dollar .

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: Listen , Karen , I need your help . I don't know anyone here yet .

te_41.speaker: B
te_41.utterance: I'm glad to help you . What's wrong ?
expanded emotion cause span: I'm glad to help you

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: My mother-in-law just went into the hospital in L . A . Hank and I will be flying there tonight .

te_41.speaker: B
te_41.utterance: I'm sorry to hear it . What's wrong with her ?
expanded emotion cause span: My mother-in-law just went into the hospital in L . A .

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: Doctors aren't sure yet . But the real problem is Suzy . She has a bad cold , and we don't want to take her with us . But we don't know who can stay with her .

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: Yes , I'd ask Jill , the girl I've had before , but I need someone overnight . Maybe even for two nights .

te_41.speaker: B
te_41.utterance: I could have Suzy stay at my place .

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: I don't want to do that to you , Karen .

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: Your own kids would get Suzy's cold . I think it would be better to have a good babysitter here . But I don't know who to ask . I need someone more mature than Jill . It might even be for two or three days .

te_41.speaker: B
te_41.utterance: I know who we can ask . There is a girl I know , Sara Ralston . She is 17 , and she will usually take this kind of job . I know her from my church , and I trust her completely .

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: I'd like to talk with her . This is short notice , I know . But Hank and I are leaving tonight .

te_41.speaker: B
te_41.utterance: I'll get you her number . I hope she can do it . She is very responsible .

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: I'm glad you know someone . I knew you would be the best person to ask about this . I don't want to insult Jill or her mother . I think Jill maybe could do it . But I'd rather have someone a little older .
expanded emotion cause span: There is a girl I know , Sara Ralston . She is 17 , and she will usually take this kind of job . I know her from my church , and I trust her completely .
I hope she can do it . She is very responsible .

te_41.speaker: B
te_41.utterance: I'll go home and get Sara's number . I'll call her first myself .

te_41.speaker: A
te_41.utterance: Great . Then call me and let me know if she's free .
expanded emotion cause span: There is a girl I know , Sara Ralston . She is 17 , and she will usually take this kind of job . I know her from my church , and I trust her completely .
I hope she can do it . She is very responsible .
I'll go home and get Sara's number . I'll call her first myself .
